Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have attracted much attention worldwide because of their potential for providing clean and reliable electric power.
Titulo: Natural Mineral-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with Heterogeneous Nanocomposite Derived from Hematite and Rare-Earth Minerals

Sentencas: However, their commercialization is subject to the high operating temperatures and costs.
Titulo: Natural Mineral-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with Heterogeneous Nanocomposite Derived from Hematite and Rare-Earth Minerals

Sentencas: To make SOFCs more competitive, here we report a novel and attractive nanocomposite hematite LaCePrOx (hematite LCP) synthesized from low-cost natural hematite and LaCePr-carbonate mineral as an electrolyte candidate.
Titulo: Natural Mineral-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with Heterogeneous Nanocomposite Derived from Hematite and Rare-Earth Minerals

Sentencas: This heterogeneous composite exhibits a conductivity as high as 0.116 S cm(-1) at 600 degrees C with an activation energy of 0.50 eV at 400-600 degrees C.
Titulo: Natural Mineral-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with Heterogeneous Nanocomposite Derived from Hematite and Rare-Earth Minerals

Sentencas: For the first time, a fuel cell using such a natural mineral-based composite demonstrates a maximum power density of 625 mW cm(-2) at 600 degrees C and notable power output of 386 mW cm(-2) at 450 degrees C.
Titulo: Natural Mineral-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with Heterogeneous Nanocomposite Derived from Hematite and Rare-Earth Minerals

Sentencas: The extraordinary ionic conductivity and device performances are primarily attributed to the heterophasic interfacial conduction effect of the hematite-LCP composite.
Titulo: Natural Mineral-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with Heterogeneous Nanocomposite Derived from Hematite and Rare-Earth Minerals

Sentencas: These superior properties, along with the merits of ultralow cost, abundant storage, and eco-friendliness, make the new composite a highly promising material for commercial SOFCs.
Titulo: Natural Mineral-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with Heterogeneous Nanocomposite Derived from Hematite and Rare-Earth Minerals
